name: rinobot-plugin-line-plot
description: Makes a line plot of xy or xyyy data
author: eoin murray

xmin.description: Specify minimum x value for the graph.

xmax.description: Specify maximum x value for the graph.

ymin.description: Specify minimum y value for the graph.

ymax.description: Specify maximum y value for the graph.

xlabel.description: The label for the x axis

ylabel.description: The label for the y axis
